subject: We selling branded watches.Rolexes.Patek.Bvlgari and more.    zn2sf
body: (There is something pleasant in watching, from dry land, the great difficulties another man is undergoing out on the high sea, with the winds lashing the waters. This is not because one derives delight from any man's distress, but because it is pleasurable to perceive from what troubles one is oneself free.)
